hero.title: Discover a New Altitude of Comfort and Class
hero.subtitle: At VivaJets, we go beyond luxury. From executives advancing Africa's industries to individuals seeking seamless travel, our private flight services are built around efficiency, safety, and comfort. Wherever work, opportunity, or leisure takes you, VivaJets keeps you moving forward.

reach.title: Reach Anywhere, Whenever.
reach.subtitle: Wherever opportunity calls, VivaJets gets you there with ease, connecting leaders, businesses, and dreamers across Africa and beyond.

dna.title: Our DNA
dna.subtitle: The core values that drive excellence in private aviation

dividends.title: DIVIDENDS
dividends.subtitle: Return on Investment
dividends.description: Investing in private aviation isn't just about travel — it's about unlocking value through time saved, efficiency gained, and opportunities seized.

indulgence.title: INDULGENCE
indulgence.subtitle: Luxury and Convenience
indulgence.description: Enjoy the highest standards of comfort with effortless booking and personalized service. Every detail is designed around you.

efficiency.title: EFFICIENCY
efficiency.subtitle: Time-Saving
efficiency.description: Avoid long lines, rigid schedules, and airport delays. Fly when you want, how you want – and make every minute count.

sanctuary.title: SANCTUARY
sanctuary.subtitle: Safety and Security
sanctuary.description: Our top-tier aircraft, rigorous maintenance protocols, and discreet operations ensure your peace of mind from takeoff to landing.

value.title: VALUE
value.subtitle: Cost-Effective
value.description: Whether through fractional ownership, smart charter services, or long-term leases, our solutions are built to align with your financial goals without compromise.

artistry.title: ARTISTRY
artistry.subtitle: Expertise and Experience
artistry.description: With decades of aviation insight, our team brings unparalleled expertise to every flight, ensuring a seamless and exceptional journey.

ready.title: Ready When You Are
ready.subtitle: Our world-class service begins the moment you reach out. Whether you're planning weeks ahead or within hours, we're here to deliver seamless, sky-bound perfection.

blog.title: Blogs
blog.subtitle: From industry trends to travel stories, the VivaJets Blog keeps you informed and inspired about private aviation in Africa and beyond.
blog.empty: No blog posts found for the selected filter.

media.title: We Are Redefining African Aviation Through Bold Cross-Industry Collaborations
media.subtitle: VivaJets partner with Africa’s brightest talents and industries to showcase the continent’s innovation and creativity to the world. From fashion to technology and beyond, every collaboration is a statement of excellence, pride, and progress.

navigation.requestQuoteSubtitle: Share a few details and we'll build a personalized offer for you.

footer.tagline: Seamless private travel for those who demand the exceptional.

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp
whatsapp.description: Chat with us on WhatsApp for quick bookings and enquiries.

call.title: Call Us
call.description: Call our customer care representative via the contact number for bookings and enquiries.

mobile.title: Mobile
mobile.description: Call our mobile number for urgent bookings and enquiries.

email.description: For inquiries, reviews and comments send a mail to our official email address via

office.description: For a visit and physical booking, visit our office

whatYouGet.title: What You Get With Us
whatYouGet.subtitle: At VivaJets, every journey is designed around you. We go beyond transportation to deliver an experience defined by comfort, trust, and flexibility. Here’s what sets us apart:

flightsThatFit.title: Travel on Your Terms
flightsThatFit.description: We work around your schedule. Whether it's early morning or same-day departure, we get you in the air when you need to be.

rightJet.title: The Right Jet for Every Trip
rightJet.description: Light jets for short flights. Larger cabins for long hauls. We'll help you choose what works best for your destination, group size, and preferences.

realPeople.title: Real People, Real Service
realPeople.description: It’s not just about booking a flight. We’re here to design your journey, answer your questions, and make sure you travel with ease.

safety.title: Safety Without Compromise
safety.description: Every flight upholds the highest international standards, giving you total peace of mind.

globalReach.title: Seamless Global Reach
globalReach.description: We are committed to connecting you effortlessly to anywhere in the world.

title.desktop:
You Call the Shots.
We Handle the
Flight.
title.mobile: You Call the Shots. We Handle the Flight.

aboutHero.subtitle: Say yes to efficiency, flexibility, and control. VivaJets is built for leaders, innovators, and enterprises driving Africa's growth, delivering private flights that keep you on schedule and ahead of the curve.
